flavorText: Wracked and warped with anguish, it obsessively seeks out other souls to hoard within its eternal prison.

foreignData.flavorText: Von Pein durchdrungen und verzerrt sucht er verzweifelt nach anderen Seelen, die er mit in sein ewiges Gefängnis ziehen kann.
foreignData.name: Drogskol-Plünderer
foreignData.text:
Fliegend, Doppelschlag, Lebensverknüpfung
Immer wenn du Lebenspunkte dazuerhältst, ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: Quebrado por el dolor, busca obsesivamente otras almas para almacenar en su prisión eterna.
foreignData.name: Desgarrador Drogskol
foreignData.text:
Vuela, daña dos veces, vínculo vital.
Siempre que ganes vidas, roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: Fou d'angoisse, il traque d'autres âmes pour les collectionner dans sa prison éternelle.
foreignData.name: Pillard du drogskol
foreignData.text:
Vol, double initiative, lien de vie
À chaque fois que vous gagnez des points de vie, piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: Tormentato e deformato dalla sofferenza, cerca ossessivamente altre anime da accumulare nella sua prigione eterna.
foreignData.name: Drogskol Razziatore
foreignData.text:
Volare, doppio attacco, legame vitale
Ogniqualvolta guadagni punti vita, pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: 苦悶に痛めつけられねじくれたそれは、永遠の牢獄に閉じ込めるための新たな魂を取り憑かれたかのように探し続けている。
foreignData.name: ドラグスコルの肉裂き
foreignData.text:
飛行、二段攻撃、絆魂
あなたがライフを得るたび、カードを１枚引く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — スピリット

foreignData.flavorText: 괴로움에 시달려 뒤틀린 그것은 자신과 함께 영혼의 감옥에서 고통을 받을 자들을 끊임없이 찾아다닌다.
foreignData.name: 드로그스콜 강탈자
foreignData.text:
비행, 이단공격, 생명연결
당신이 생명점을 얻을 때마다, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Angustiado e amargurado, ele busca obsessivamente outras almas para adicionar a sua coleção em sua prisão eterna.
foreignData.name: Despojador Drogskol
foreignData.text:
Voar, golpe duplo, vínculo com a vida
Toda vez que ganhar pontos de vida, compre um card.

foreignData.flavorText: Сокрушенный и покоробленный страданием, он одержим поисками других душ, чтобы заточить их в своей вечной темнице.
foreignData.name: Дрогсколский Громила
foreignData.text:
Полет, Двойной удар, Цепь жизни
Каждый раз когда вы получаете жизнь(-и), возьмите карту.

foreignData.flavorText: 它被极度痛苦所充盈而扭曲，亟欲将其他灵魂囚入自己的永恒牢笼。
foreignData.name: 卓兹克裂肢灵
foreignData.text:
飞行，连击，系命
每当你获得生命时，抓一张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 它被極度痛苦所充盈而扭曲，亟欲將其他靈魂囚入自己的永恆牢籠。
foreignData.name: 卓茲克裂肢靈
foreignData.text:
飛行，連擊，繫命
每當你獲得生命時，抽一張牌。

name: Drogskol Reaver
originalText:
Flying, double strike, lifelink
Whenever you gain life, draw a card.

rulings.text: If Drogskol Reaver deals enough first-strike damage to destroy each creature it’s blocking or was blocked by, it won’t deal any damage during the regular combat damage step (unless it’s attacking and somehow gains trample). Its ability won’t trigger a second time that combat.
The ability triggers just once for each life-gaining event, no matter how much life was gained.

If multiple creatures with lifelink you control deal combat damage at the same time, the damage dealt by each of those creatures is a separate life-gaining event and Drogskol Reaver’s ability will trigger that many times.

If a creature with lifelink you control deals damage to multiple creatures, players, and/or planeswalkers at the same time, the ability will trigger just once. The damage dealt by that creature is a single life-gaining event.

text:
Flying, double strike, lifelink
Whenever you gain life, draw a card.
